facilities¶

Created on Tue May 28 11:32:33 2019

@author: yoelr

class biosteam.units.facilities.Facility(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), thermo=None)[source]¶
class biosteam.units.facilities.ProcessWaterCenter(ID='', ins=None, outs=())[source]¶
Parameters

  • ins –

    [0] Recycle water

    [1] Make-up water

  • outs – [0] Process water

class biosteam.units.facilities.ChilledWaterPackage(ID='')[source]¶

Create a chilled water package that is cost based on flow rate of chilled water.

Parameters

Duty (float) – Chilled water duty (kJ/hr)

class biosteam.units.facilities.BoilerTurbogenerator(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), *, boiler_efficiency=0.8, turbogenerator_efficiency=0.85, side_steam=None)[source]¶

Create a BoilerTurbogenerator object that will calculate electricity generation from burning the feed. It also takes into account how much steam is being produced, and the required cooling utility of the turbo generator. No emissions or mass balances are taken into account.

Parameters

  • ins (stream sequence) –

    [0] Liquid/solid feed that will be burned.

    [1] Gas that will be burned.

    [2] Make-up water.

  • outs (stream sequence) –

    [0] Emission from burned liquid/solid feed.

    [1] Emission from burned gas feed.

    [2] Blowdown water.

  • boiler_efficiency (float) – Fraction of heat transfered to steam.

  • turbo_generator_efficiency (float) – Fraction of steam heat converted to electricity.

duty_over_mol = 45000¶

Make this a whole system instead of approximating duty per mol values

Type
